name: DMM Halfnuts Set 1-7
description: Increase your protection options for your fingertip crack project, or shave some grams on your alpine rack. The Halfnuts are essentially half a Wallnut, with a narrower width that excels in pin scars and shallow placements.Narrow width for stable placements in shallow cracks.Same taper as the classic Wallnut.Set of 7 from size 1 (purple) to size 7 (grey).
